channel.title: Checkpoint Midnight: Cold Iron Curtain (GCOG One Shot)
channel.description: **Checkpoint Midnight: Cold Iron Curtain (GCOG One Shot)** Players: @Will_H, Brian L, Seann S, Adam M Vienna, in the midst of the Cold War: four operatives infiltrate a glamorous gala in pursuit of a magical tome for creating golems. Backstabbing, bridge-burning, and bear-fighting ensues. https://youtu.be/rIY__XZ-OPc

Checkpoint Midnight: Cold Iron Curtain (GCOG One Shot)
Players: @Will_H, Brian L, Seann S, Adam M
Vienna, in the midst of the Cold War: four operatives infiltrate a glamorous gala in pursuit of a magical tome for creating golems. Backstabbing, bridge-burning, and bear-fighting ensues.
